sentences.en: Are you fucking a florist behind my back?
sentences.cn: 你是不是背着我跟个种花的好上了?

sentences.en: Calls to the florist were always in vain - it was a cash purchase.
sentences.cn: 多次打电话询问花店,均无所获,盖因系现金支付.

sentences.en: Could you stop at that florist shop over there?
sentences.cn: 劳驾在那边花店停一下好不好?

sentences.en: Florist : thanks . And just so you know, am ready to date.
sentences.cn: 谢谢. 你该知道我已经准备好约会了.

sentences.en: Florist shops , furriers , haberdashers, confectioners -- all followed in rapid succession.
sentences.cn: 鲜花店、皮草行、男子服饰用品店 、 糖果店, 一家挨着一家.

sentences.en: He bought her some roses at the florist's in the mall.
sentences.cn: 他在购物中心的花店里为她买了一些玫瑰。

sentences.en: He ordered the coachman to stop at a florist's where he bought a bouquet of roses.
sentences.cn: 他吩咐赶车的在花铺站门前停一下,他在那里买了一束玫瑰花.

sentences.en: I stole his bride. I guess it's OK to poach the florist.
sentences.cn: 我偷了他的新娘, 我想把他的花商偷来应该没问题吧.

sentences.en: I was surprised to see the florist delivering a huge, beautiful plant.
sentences.cn: 我惊奇地发现花店营业员送来一大束美丽的鲜花.

sentences.en: I've ordered some flowers from the florist's.
sentences.cn: 我向花店订购了一些花。

sentences.en: In my personal florist, I can flower arrangement or plant.
sentences.cn: 在我的私人花店中, 我可以插花或者种植.

sentences.en: The florist bunched the flowers up.
The florist had to thaw out our newly planted tulips with a hair dryer.
sentences.cn: 种花人得用吹风机把刚刚种植的郁金香解冻.

sentences.en: Then, went to get the telephone, to call the florist shop.
sentences.cn: 然后去拿电话, 打电话询问花店.

sentences.en: You can earn good money by starting your own florist shop.
sentences.cn: 你可以从自己的钱很好赚花店店.

sentences.en: You just imprisoned a florist to find out if he sent you roses.
sentences.cn: 你把花店店主非法拘禁就是为了查明是不是他给你送的玫瑰?

trans.tran_en: someone who owns or works in a shop that sells flowers and indoor plants for the home
